data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Anabar, Nauru.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anabar, Nauru
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Anabar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 63 believers in Anabar against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 63 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Anabar
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Anabar, Anabar, Nauru.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Anabar, Nauru to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Anabar who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Anabar, Nauru has a population of 500.

We estimate Anabar has 63 people who might know Jesus, 365 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 72 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Anabar against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.
